aboutpara:
I am Arturo Martín del Campo, a finance professional who believes genuine progress stems from curiosity, collaboration and clear communication. After graduating from Tecnológico de Monterrey, I’ve devoted my career to uncovering opportunities and guiding teams through change—first at Finver Capital and BBVA, and now as co-founder of Grupo Arze, where I shape our real-estate investment vision.

I thrive on turning big ideas into tangible results through empathy, adaptability and an unwavering drive for excellence. Whether it’s building strong relationships with partners, mentoring emerging talent or rallying stakeholders around a shared purpose, I bring energy and integrity to every project.

Beyond work, you’ll find me exploring Aguascalientes’ historic neighborhoods with my camera, diving into inspiring business books or volunteering to teach financial literacy. I’m always eager to learn, connect and create lasting value together.
